developer.title: Full Stack Developer
developer.about: Passionate about developing user-friendly and responsive websites.

experience.description: Developed the frontend for the College Details and Compare College pages in the MyCollegeMentor project using React.js and Tailwind CSS, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface.

Developed a visually appealing and user-friendly interface using React.js and CSS, ensuring a seamless shopping experience across all devices with a fully responsive design. Implemented a dynamic product catalog allowing users to easily browse and filter items while leveraging React state management and reusable JSX components for efficient handling of user interactions.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Mehta
testimonials.content: Bhavishya has an exceptional eye for detail and a deep understanding of user psychology. His designs not only look beautiful but always serve the core purpose of enhancing usability.

testimonials.name: Priya Desai
testimonials.content: Working with Bhavishya was transformative for our products. He brings both creativity and strategic thinking to the table, resulting in designs that truly resonate with users.

testimonials.name: Arjun Nair
testimonials.content: As a developer, I appreciate how Bhavishya creates designs that are not only beautiful but also implementable. His attention to detail and documentation make the development process so much smoother.
